key_points: ✅ Auto-update all dependencies to latest versions
✅ Find an available port (typically 3001-3010) and display the URL
✅ Display MCP documentation, agent capabilities, and system docs

installation_steps.instruction: Copy the `agile-ai-agents` folder and `CLAUDE.md` to your project
Your project structure should look like:
Copy the `agile-ai-agents` folder and `CLAUDE.md` to your existing project's root directory
Ensure all subfolders are included (ai-agents, project-dashboard, etc.)
The CLAUDE.md file should be at your project root to configure AgileAiAgents integration
**Watch documents appear** in real-time on dashboard
